code: import{client}from'../utils/fetchClient';export var getTodos=function getTodos(userId){return client.get("/todos?userId=".concat(userId));};export var postTodo=function postTodo(title,todoId){return client.post('/todos',{todoId:todoId,completed:false,title:title});};export var deleteTodo=function deleteTodo(todoId){return client.delete("/todos/".concat(todoId));};export var updateTodo=function updateTodo(todoId,data){return client.patch("/todos/".concat(todoId),data);};
